title: MLB Pressbox Home Page UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to https://www.mlbpressbox.com/
custom_steps: WHEN the page fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Full background skin of the team's primary color (Gray for MLBPressbox.com)
* MLBPressbox header
* Game Schedule column
* Pressbox Assets accordion
* Help footer
* MLB footer

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Pressbox Header
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Pressbox home page
custom_steps: WHEN the header fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the header will contain the following:

* MLBPressbox.com logo
* MLB Aspera icon
* Log out icon
* Stats
* Multimedia
* Downloads
* Credentialing 
* Media Guides
* Game Notes
* Roster (for team-specific Pressbox pages only)
* Pressbox Sites

THEN tapping on an item will redirect the user to the site associated with that item

title: Pressbox Sites Header Item
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the page and the header fully loaded
custom_steps: WHEN the user hovers/selects Pressbox Sites item
custom_expected:
THEN the following logos will be displayed:

About MLB
- MLB 
- MLB Draft

Jewel Events
- Spring Training
- All-Star Game
- Postseason
- London Series

Clubs
- 30 clubs of MLB

MLB Pressbox
- MLBPressbox.com

THEN tapping on a logo will redirect the user to the site associated with that logo

title: Game Schedule Column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the Game Schedule Column fully loaded with the following:

* Current day
* All Scores text link
* Game status
* Team logos of the matchup
* R score
* for in-progress games: gameday icon
* for final games: video icon and box icon
* "Free Game of the Day" messaging (if applicable)
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps/selects on the
custom_expected:
THEN tapping on an icon will redirect the user to the site associated with that logo

THEN tapping on a gameday icon will redirect the user to the gameday page associated with that logo

title: Pressbox Assets Accordion
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Pressbox page
custom_steps: WHEN the Pressbox Assets accordion fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Press Releases/Game Notes/Today's Scorecards accordions with a collapsible arrow at the end
* Asset column (for Press Releases and Game Notes accordions)
* Source column
* Date column
* Title column
* "View More" link text (for Press Releases and Game Notes accordions)

THEN tapping/selecting on an item in any of the accordions will either download the file on the user's machine or redirect the user to the site associated to that item

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

title: "View More" Link Text (Press Releases/Game Notes)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user tapped on "View More" link
custom_steps: WHEN the page fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* {MLBPressbox/ClubPressbox} Header
* Press Releases/Game Notes title 
* All Teams dropdown
* Month dropdown
* Year dropdown
* Clear button
* Asset column
* Source column
* Date column
* Title column
* Page navigator (Prev / Current Page / Next)

THEN tapping/selecting on an item in any of the accordions will either download the file on the user's machine or redirect the user to the site associated to that item

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

THEN the user will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work as expected and as the name suggests

title: Stats and Credentialing Header Items (not under DIGIT)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to either MLBPressbox.com or Club.com page
custom_steps:
[1] WHEN the user taps on Stats from the header

[2] WHEN the user taps on Credentialing from the header
custom_expected:
[1] THEN the user will be redirected to MLB's Statistics page

[2] THEN the user will be redirected to mlb.credentials.com page

title: Multimedia Header Item
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLBPressbox homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Multimedia from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Installation instruction of Aspera Connect 
* Teams dropdown (contains all MLB teams)
* Team column
* Asset ID column
* Title column
* File Size column
* Start Date column
* End Date column
* Page navigator (Prev / Current Page / Next) 

THEN the user will be able to click and download on any multimedia 

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

THEN the file downloaded will be about and from this team only

THEN the user will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work as expected and as the name suggests

title: Downloads Header Item
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to either MLBPressbox.com or Club.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Downloads from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to MLBPressbox.com Downloads

THEN the page will display the following:

* Terms and Conditions popup (for the first visit after login)
* MLB Pressbox/Club Downloads/Marketing Initiatives/Special Events dropdown
* Clear button
* Name/Title column
* Files column 

THEN the user will be able to click to download make use of the file (not corrupted or broken file)

THEN the user will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work as expected and as the name suggests

title: Media Guides Header Item
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLBPressbox.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Media Guides from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB and all 30 club's collapsible accordions
* MLB/team logo of opened accordion(s)
* Current Year/Archive sections

THEN tapping/selecting on an item in any of the accordions will download the file on the user's machine

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

title: Help Footer
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user scrolled to the bottom of the page
custom_steps: WHEN the user sees the "Help" footer
custom_expected:
THEN the footer will contain the following:

* Help
* "Jump to MLB Sites" dropdown that will contain the 30 MLB club names

THEN the user will be able to click on the elements and the user will be redirected to the sites associated with the selected item

title: Multimedia Header Item
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team-specific homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Multimedia from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Installation instruction of Aspera Connect 
* Team column - will show the logo of the current team throughout the rows
* Asset ID column
* Title column
* File Size column
* Start Date column
* End Date column
* Page navigator (Prev / Current Page / Next) 

THEN the user will be able to click and download on any multimedia 

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

THEN the file downloaded will be about and from this team only

THEN the user will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work as expected and as the name suggests

title: Media Guides Header Item
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team-specific page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Media Guides from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Year column
* Title column
* File Size column

THEN the user will be able to click to download make use of the file (not corrupted or broken file)

title: Game Notes Header Item
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to team-specific page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Game Notes from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* {ClubPressbox} Header
* Game Notes title 
* Month dropdown
* Year dropdown
* Clear button
* Asset column
* Source column
* Date column
* Title column
* Page navigator (Prev / Current Page / Next)
* Help footer
* MLB footer

THEN tapping/selecting on an item in any of the accordions will either download the file on the user's machine or redirect the user to the site associated to that item

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

THEN the user will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Roster Header Item
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team's pressbox page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Roster from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* {Club} Roster & Staff
* 40-Man Roster (Pitchers/Catchers/Infielders/Outfielders) sections 
* Coaching Staff (Managing/Coach) sections
* B/T, H, W, DOB, and Downloads columns 
* Supplemental Bios column (if applicable)

THEN tapping on any downloads icon will download that player's image only (no other player)

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

THEN tapping on any person's name will redirect the user to that user's MLB info page only (no other player)

THEN the user will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work as expected

title: Pressbox Assets Accordion
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team's pressbox page
custom_steps: WHEN the team's Pressbox Assets accordion fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Press Releases and Game Notes accordions with a collapsible arrow at the end
* Asset column
* Source column that will only contain the selected team's logo
* Date column
* Title column
* "View More" link text (if applicable)

THEN the page will also display additional accordions such as: (Note that this is not applicable for all teams)

* Today's Scorecards (if there is a scheduled game today)
* Media Clips
* Supplemental Bios
* Minor Leagues
* Additional Club Information

THEN tapping/selecting on an item in any of the accordions will either download the file on the user's machine or redirect the user to the site associated to that item

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

title: Team's Game Schedule Column
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team's pressbox page
custom_steps: WHEN the team's Schedule Column fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the {Team Name} Schedule column will display the following:

* Game navigator (Prev Game / Next Game)
* Team matchup logos
* Team standing
* Game status
* for pregame: Day, Month ## ∙ Time of matchup - Preview icon below
* for in progress: Top/Bot inning number, ball-strike, outs, base icon - Gameday icon below
* for final: Day, Month ##, box score - Box and Video icons below

THEN the user will be able to click on the elements and the user will be redirected to the sites associated with the selected item

title: Gameday Information (not present to all teams)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team's pressbox page
custom_steps: WHEN the team's Gameday Information column fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to click and download on the gameday information

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

THEN the file downloaded will be gameday info from this team only (not from any other teams)

title: Club Notes Column
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team's pressbox page
custom_steps: WHEN the team's Club Notes column fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to see the contact information of the club

THEN the user will be redirected to emailing/calling the contact person listed here (if applicable)

title: Pronunciation Guide (currently available for NYY only)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team's pressbox page
custom_steps: WHEN the team's Pronunciation Guide column fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to tap on "Pronunciation Guide" button

THEN the user will be redirected to this team's pronunciation guide page

title: Media Guide Column
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to the team's pressbox page
custom_steps: WHEN the team's Media Guide column fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to click and download on the media guide

THEN the user will be able to make use of the downloaded file (not corrupted or broken file)

THEN the file downloaded will be media guide from this team only (not from any other teams)
